resources.string: Quick Dynalist requires an api token to access your dynalist account. Please generate a token in the following step and copy it into the app. The token will only be locally stored on this device.
Please copy the token you generated into the text box below.
Add the tag #quickdynalist, #inbox, or ðŸ“• to items that should appear in this list. Updates might take a moment to take effect and require WIFI.
A date is required if time is specified
There is no inbox configured. Please visit your Dynalist and select \"Set as inbox\" in the menu of an item. No panic, we will try to add this item again later.
